thread.title: Rock Coast Rollers host Derbytante Ball
thread.title_full: Rock Coast Rollers host Derbytante Ball

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Rock Coast Rollers host Derbytante Ball
text:
Rock Coast Rollers host Derbytante Ball Oct 13, 2015 Photo by: Facebook Even on non-Halloween-adjacent years, the Derbytante Ball brings out the sartorial splendor of Rock Coast Rollers and their fans. 
Rockland — Rock Coast Rollers will celebrate the end of another season with their annual year-end soiree. The fifth annual Derbytante Ball will take place Saturday, Oct. 24, starting 8 p.m. at Trackside Station, 4 Union St. 
The grand gala fetes a season that included hosting the inaugural Rock Coast Rollers Coastal Chaos Tournament and competing at East Coast Derby Extravaganza (ECDX) in Philadelphia. As always, the event also introduces this season’s Fresh Meat as newly minted veteran skaters. 
With this year’s Derbytante set for right around Halloween, costumes are even more encouraged. Whether decked out in one’s most outlandish prom dress or as Cruella DeVille, attendees are guaranteed to have the best time. Dancing is required, aided and abetted by DJ McLovin. Photo booth fun will be provided. 
Tickets are $5 and can be purchased at the door. There will be raffle, as well as a dessert auction, with delicious treats provided by Rock Coast Rollers skaters. 
Founded in 2011, Rock Coast Rollers is a diverse group of women dedicated to advancing and advocating for the sport of roller derby, women, our league and our community. The 501(c)3 nonprofit business is committed to forming bonds within the community, becoming role models for young women and activating lasting friendships through the sport of roller derby. For more information, visit rockcoastrollers.org . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
